text: the treatments for nonbullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of nonbullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma:  - Foundation for Ichthyosis and Related Skin Types (FIRST): Treatments  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Autosomal Recessive Congenital Ichthyosis  - Genetic Testing Registry: Autosomal recessive congenital ichthyosis 2   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health co
